#summary The button element represents a button in a web form.
#labels about-html,is-html-element,from-w3c,about-forms

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *button element*

== Usage ==

[SpecificationHTML4 HTML 4] says, "Buttons created with the `button` element function just like buttons created with the [InputElement input] element, but they offer richer rendering possibilities: the `button` element may have content."

== Attributes ==

  * [ButtonDisabledAttribute disabled]
  * [ButtonNameAttribute name]
  * [ButtonTypeAttribute type]
  * [ButtonValueAttribute value]
